articles.author: Clea Skopeliti
articles.title: First Thing: Sarah Palin loses Alaska race to Democrat Mary Peltola - The Guardian US
articles.description: Peltola’s win makes her the first Alaska Native to serve in the House. Plus, ‘supermajority’ of up to 80% of Americans back climate action
articles.content:
Good morning.
The Democrat Mary Peltola has won the special election for Alaskas only US House seat, becoming the first Alaska Native to serve in the House after beating candidates including the Rep… [+6346 chars]
